items.title: Germany’s Mukran LNG Terminal Reopens After Frozen Baltic Is Cleared
items.summary: Operations at the Mukran LNG terminal in Germany’s Baltic Sea have resumed following successful icebreaking operations to clear a navigable channel. The facility had been temporarily disrupted by heavy sea ice, preventing cargo ships from departing.S

items.title: Eni Makes Major Gas Discovery Offshore Ivory Coast

items.title: China Secures Record Russian Oil Imports as India Reduces Purchases
